descriptionText: Resources that run `kube-apiserver` should set the `--authorization-mode` flag to include `RBAC`. If `--authorization-mode=RBAC` is not present, RBAC authorization will not be enforced and access control may be insufficient. This rule checks `containers` and `initContainers` commands for `kube-apiserver` and flags those missing the `--authorization-mode` `RBAC` mode.
